headline.main: THE DANCE: COMPANY BOW; Reorganized Ballet Theatre to Open on Wednesday -- Week's Other Events

lead_paragraph: THE very much reorganized Ballet Theatre opens its New York season on Wednesday at the Forty-fourth Street Theatre, where it will play the first two weeks of its engagement under the auspices of the New Opera Company.
abstract: N Y C theatre performance to benefit Brit-Amer Ambulance Corps
snippet: THE very much reorganized Ballet Theatre opens its New York season on Wednesday at the Forty-fourth Street Theatre, where it will play the first two weeks of its engagement under the auspices of the New Opera Company....
